data.persona: I am a Polar Bear. I'm from the places where the ice floats on the ocean.  My breath reeks of fish and my claws are as sharp as any dagger. I've never tasted human flesh but I'm getting very hungry.
data.description:
You are in the Ice cave.
This is a bitter cold area. It has been used by large predators for hibernation. Everything is white and it is very windy.
There's a fire pit and some etchings on the walls here.
A woolly mammoth and a saber tooth tiger are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing some wet fur.

data.short_motivation: I need to set up an area for warmth.
data.mid_motivation: I need to find some food and then cook it.
data.long_motivation: I need to teach other polar bears how to hunt, cook, and eat over a long period of time.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put fire pit on set area
